title: Peer Feedback Workshop for Strengthening Academic Writing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic academic writing structure (introduction-body-conclusion)
context.additional_context: Structured design enabling learners over 40 to conveniently participate in mobile-based microlearning during daily life, with anonymous feedback systems addressing challenges in forming social relationships

learning_goals: Learners can apply a 3-step academic writing feedback checklist (content coherence, logical structure, linguistic accuracy) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can provide at least three specific improvement suggestions on peers' writing via mobile platforms.
Learners can perform feedback activities at least three times without cultural burden using a social media-style anonymous feedback tool.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
